snippet: The vast majority of the more than 1,200 acts performing on, it seems, every level surface in Austin — clubs, warehouses, backyards, a bridge — are still hopefuls.
abstract: The vast majority of the more than 1,200 acts performing on, it seems, every level surface in Austin — clubs, warehouses, backyards, a bridge — are still hopefuls.

headline.main: Amid the SXSW Avalanche, a Chance to Discover
